_sText:
This map has been worked on for several months.

I take my time when my make my maps.

This map has been tested on my community's Zombiemod server, and they like it very much.
It's one of the top voted maps on our server.

There is no real story behind this map or anything, i just got the idea to make this map from different games I've played and i came up with this.

All the rooms were thought up on the spot, thats just how I am. 

I did plan this from the beginning, i didn't just sit down and make it.

The map features:

many buttons that aid the humans in their struggle against the zombies.
breakable objects to balance the game.
a shakeable semi that if the humans on top do not watch, they will fall off due to "losing their balance"

plenty of objects to build barricades with.

This is a face lift version, I improved the look of the street, adding sidewalk and lamp posts. 

on the bridge inside the tower above the second terrorist spawn, there is a button which when activated, will drop a vending machine, making it easier to hold off the zombies.

the long breakable platform on the roof has been extended to the edge of the roof.

the garage has been significantly improved with the addition of a non-moveable stack of boxes blocking part of the garage entrance. a lip was also placed on the floor under the garage to improve the barricading experience.


Comments or suggestions are welcome.
